name: Speed Bus
description:
Drive bus, pickup passengers and drop them off within the time limit. 

This was made for the Mini Jam 95: Chance game jam.

The idea of the game is that you have a very small time window (small chance) to press the key to pick up passengers. Furthermore, the same applies to the limited time to drop off passengers. I chose this design because of the no RNG limitation in the game jam.

Don't mind the game art, I am not particularly skilled at making art.

Made in Unity.
